hunts.title: Dartmouth
hunts.description: Become familiar with the Dartmouth campus through this orientation hunt!

hunts.title: Boston
hunts.description: Explore the greater Boston area, from coffee shops to museums to parks and bars.

hunts.title: Budapest Pub Hunt
hunts.description: This hunt will take you through all of Budapest's most famous ruin pubs. Search for clues in each pub to collect points and win a prize at Szimpla!

hunts.title: San Francisco Food Hunt
hunts.description: Hunt out the best restaurant in every neighborhood in San Francisco!
